trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"></xref> objects for a control.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma coleção de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"> </xref> objetos para um controlo.

trans-unit.source: Simple data binding is accomplished by adding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> objects to a BindingsCollection.
trans-unit.target: O enlace de dados simples é conseguido ao adicionar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>objetos para um BindingsCollection.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>

trans-unit.source: Any object that inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class can access the BindingsCollection through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DataBindings%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Qualquer objeto que herda o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>classe pode aceder a BindingsCollection através de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DataBindings%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DataBindings%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: For a list of Windows controls that support data binding, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista de controlos do Windows que suporte o enlace de dados, consulte a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified binding to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o enlace especificado para a coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"></xref> to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"> </xref> para adicionar à coleção.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"></xref> to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"> </xref> à coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"></xref> to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"> </xref> para adicionar à coleção.

trans-unit.source: The dataBinding argument was .
trans-unit.target: The dataBinding argument was .

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection of binding objects.
trans-unit.target: Limpa a coleção de objetos de enlace.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanged> event occurs when you invoke the Clear method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanged>evento ocorre quando invocar o método Clear.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection of any members.
trans-unit.target: Limpa a coleção de quaisquer membros.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the collection has changed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a coleção foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the collection is about to change.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a coleção está prestes a mudar.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of bindings in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número total de enlaces na colecção.

trans-unit.source: The total number of bindings in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O número total de enlaces na colecção.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"></xref> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"> </xref> no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"></xref> to find.
trans-unit.target: O índice do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"> </xref> localizar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"></xref> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"> </xref> no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The collection doesn't contain an item at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: A coleção não contém um item no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the bindings in the collection as an object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os enlaces da coleção como um objeto.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"></xref> containing all of the collection members.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"> </xref> que contém todos os membros da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o processador de eventos através de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnCollectionChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método oncollectionchanged originado também permite que as classes derivadas processar o evento sem anexar um delegado.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Este é a preferido técnica para processar o evento de uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanging"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanging"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanging> event occurs when the event is about to change.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanging>evento ocorre quando o evento está prestes a mudar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanging>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o processador de eventos através de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnCollectionChanging method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnCollectionChanging também permite que as classes derivadas processar o evento sem anexar um delegado.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Este é a preferido técnica para processar o evento de uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs"></xref> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs"> </xref> que contém dados de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Deletes the specified binding from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Elimina o enlace especificado da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The Binding to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: O enlace para remover da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Deletes the binding from the collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Elimina o enlace da coleção no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"></xref> to remove.
trans-unit.target: O índice do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"> </xref> para remover.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"></xref> from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove o especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"> </xref> da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"></xref> to remove.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"> </xref> para remover.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the collection should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a coleção deverá ser serializada.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the collection count is greater than zero; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a contagem de coleção é maior que zero; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
